course_title: Bachelor of Technology (Computer Science and Engineering - Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning)
syllabus_link: https://christuniversity.in/School of Engineering and Technology/COMPUTER SCIENCE AND ENGINEERING/BTech in Artifiial Intelligence and Machine Learning/syllabusstructure/5674440/2024
course_structure_link: https://christuniversity.in/School of Engineering and Technology/COMPUTER SCIENCE AND ENGINEERING/BTech in Artifiial Intelligence and Machine Learning/syllabusstructure/5674440/2024

fee_structure.time_of_payment: Within seven days of declaration of the Selection Process Result

eligibility: Artificial Intelligence: To utilize artificial intelligence principles to solve real world problems Machine Learning To select suitable machine learning algorithms for the given problem Service Learning Analyze Social Relevant Problems and design solutions through Service Learning
why_choose: Why choose this course? Faculty members with AIML expertise. State of the art infrastructure and laboratories. Industry and international benchmarked curriculum. Student centric and project-based teaching pedagogy. Research avenues, capstone projects and hackathons. Industry-Academia tie-ups.
what_learn: What you will learn? Statistical Knowledge and Applied Mathematics in Machine Learning. The benefits of AI include efficiency through task automation, data analysis for informed decisions, assistance in medical diagnosis, and the advancement of autonomous vehicles. Data Exploration and Visualization. Students learn in-demand skills like Machine Learning, ChatGPT, MLOps Big Data Technologies, Natural Language Processing, Deep Learning, Neural Networks and many more. A student also learns life skills, communication skills, leadership skills, problem-solving skills, teamwork, technical writing and service learning. Interdisciplinary Research Oriented Domain Knowledge.
modules: Modules Basic Sciences Holistic Education Technical English skills Year 1 Computer Programming language Engineering Graphics Technical Writing skills Software Engineering principles Professional Ethics Year 2 Programming Paradigm Basics of Artificial Intelligence0 Mini Project + Internships Pattern Recognition & Machine Learning Year 3 Natural Language Processing Design Thinking Project+ Internships/Seminars Image processing Open Electives Year 4 Program Electives
career: Career prospects Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning researchers work in academia or research institutions, contributing to the advancement of AIML technology and its applications. Unique AIML product or service ideas can be initiated through incubation on entrepreneurship aspects. The earning potential and salary ranges associated with an AIML profession or industry. Machine learning engineers create and deploy models for tasks like image recognition, natural language processing, and predictive analytics. AI engineers work on building systems that can perform tasks requiring human intelligence, such as language understanding, computer vision, and decision-making. AIML Engineering helps create various specialist roles like Business Intelligence, Health Care, Financial Analyst, Quantitative Analyst, NLP Engineer, Deep Learning Engineer, etc.
